query.statement: SELECT A.CODE, A.CODE_NAME, A.SORT_SEQ, nvl(B.PHF,'N') PHF FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE A, ( SELECT '001' CODE, PHF_MGMT1 PHF FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST WHERE UPJANG=#UPJANG# AND MENU_CD=#MENU_CD# AND RECIPE_CD=#RECIPE_CD# UNION ALL SELECT '002' CODE, PHF_MGMT2 PHF FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST WHERE UPJANG=#UPJANG# AND MENU_CD=#MENU_CD# AND RECIPE_CD=#RECIPE_CD# UNION ALL SELECT '003' CODE, PHF_MGMT3 PHF FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST WHERE UPJANG=#UPJANG# AND MENU_CD=#MENU_CD# AND RECIPE_CD=#RECIPE_CD# UNION ALL SELECT '004' CODE, PHF_MGMT4 PHF FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST WHERE UPJANG=#UPJANG# AND MENU_CD=#MENU_CD# AND RECIPE_CD=#RECIPE_CD# UNION ALL SELECT '005' CODE, PHF_MGMT5 PHF FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST WHERE UPJANG=#UPJANG# AND MENU_CD=#MENU_CD# AND RECIPE_CD=#RECIPE_CD# ) B WHERE A.USE_YN='Y' AND A.GROUP_CODE='FS0018' AND A.CODE=B.CODE(+) ORDER BY SORT_SEQ
